name: Torayca Carbon Fiber (Toray)
description: World-leading PAN-based carbon fiber. Used in Boeing 787, automotive, and sporting goods. Toray has 40%+ global market share.

name: Shin-Etsu Silicone Wafers
description: Largest semiconductor silicon wafer producer globally. Critical for semiconductor supply chain.

name: AGC Dragontrail Glass
description: Chemically strengthened aluminosilicate glass for smartphones and displays. Competes with Corning Gorilla Glass.

name: Nitto Denko Optical Films
description: Polarizing films, retardation films for LCD/OLED displays. Essential for display manufacturing.

name: Kuraray EVAL EVOH Barrier
description: Ethylene vinyl alcohol barrier resin for food packaging. Prevents oxygen permeation.

name: TDK MLCC Ceramics
description: Multilayer ceramic capacitors - essential passive component for all electronics. MLCC demand growing with EVs.

name: Sumitomo Metal Mining Battery Materials
description: Cathode materials (NMC, NCA) for lithium-ion batteries. Key EV battery material supplier.

name: Mitsubishi Gas Chemical BT Resin
description: Bismaleimide-triazine resin for high-frequency PCB substrates. Used in 5G and server applications.

name: Teijin Tenax Carbon Fiber
description: PAN-based carbon fiber for automotive and aerospace. Teijin also produces Twaron aramid fiber.

name: JSR Semiconductor Materials
description: Photoresists, CMP materials for semiconductor manufacturing. Essential for chip production.

name: Mitsui Chemicals Tafmer
description: Alpha-olefin copolymer elastomers for automotive and packaging applications.

name: Denka Acetylene Black
description: Conductive carbon black for lithium-ion battery anodes. High purity specialty carbon.

name: Resonac (Showa Denko) SiC
description: Silicon carbide wafers for power semiconductors. Critical for EV power electronics.

name: Nippon Steel Super Core
description: Non-oriented electrical steel for EV motors. High efficiency magnetic properties.

name: Ube Industries Polyimide
description: UPILEX polyimide films for flexible PCBs and aerospace. High heat resistance.
